name: ai-form-autofill-client
description: Browser extension client for AI Form Auto Fill

scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-assets && npm run fix-content-script
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/*.html dist/ && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && (cp src/*.css dist/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp src/*.png dist/ 2>/dev/null || true)
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
